title: Grab the iPhone 16e Default Wallpaper
description: Perhaps you recently saw that Apple had released the iPhone 16e and drooled with envy at the iPhone 16e default wallpaper, which sort of looks like a drop of Liquid Metal (why did macOS Sequoia autocorrect capitalize “Liquid Metal”? author: Paul Horowitz
excerpt: Perhaps you recently saw that Apple had released the iPhone 16e and drooled with envy at the iPhone 16e default wallpaper, which sort of looks like a drop of Liquid Metal (why did macOS Sequoia aut…
text: Perhaps you recently saw that Apple had released the iPhone 16e and drooled with envy at the iPhone 16e default wallpaper, which sort of looks like a drop of Liquid Metal (why did macOS Sequoia autocorrect capitalize “Liquid Metal”? Who knows, but it did it again, so let’s go with it) or maybe a water droplet suspended in air. But you don’t need to spend $600 on a new entry-level iPhone just to get a new wallpaper, you can download the full resolution version right now and throw it on your current iPhone, an Android, iPad, Mac, or Windows PC. Click the image below to launch the full sized version into a new window, or click this link to do the same. Save it, set it as your wallpaper, and enjoy. If this particular wallpaper isn’t your cup of tea, there are plenty more that you might like instead. The iPhone 16e wallpaper is a fun little addition to any device, and it arrives to us from 9to5mac, so thanks to them for uncovering the wallpaper.
html:
Perhaps you recently saw that Apple had released the iPhone 16e and drooled with envy at the iPhone 16e default wallpaper, which sort of looks like a drop of Liquid Metal (why did macOS Sequoia autocorrect capitalize “Liquid Metal”? Who knows, but it did it again, so let’s go with it) or maybe a water droplet suspended in air.

But you don’t need to spend $600 on a new entry-level iPhone just to get a new wallpaper, you can download the full resolution version right now and throw it on your current iPhone, an Android, iPad, Mac, or Windows PC.

Click the image below to launch the full sized version into a new window, or click this link to do the same.

Save it, set it as your wallpaper, and enjoy.

If this particular wallpaper isn’t your cup of tea, there are plenty more that you might like instead.

The iPhone 16e wallpaper is a fun little addition to any device, and it arrives to us from 9to5mac, so thanks to them for uncovering the wallpaper.
